name: Mission: Escape from Island
description:
Mission: Escape from Island is an excellent shooter to pass with a bright modern graphics! Dive into the story of a soldier who has gotten to the enemy army’s territory by his fate, where he can’t wait for help and can rely only on himself! Whether he can survive in this hell, depends on you only.
The unique survival experience on the island is guaranteed to you, so fight with hordes of enemies and constantly look for weapons. There will be plenty of difficulties.
